attributes.action: Ban Battery Farming of Hens and gradually fade out all Battery Farming in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is inhumane and cruel to the animals. In the 21st Century all farming should become free range. Britain should lead the way.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban Battery Farming of Hens and gradually fade out all Battery Farming in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14663.asp

Prime Minister's Office
